Desc.entry: Offers karate classes at various venues in Sheffield for people aged 5 to 75 years. Caters for families to train together within the same class. Classes are currently held at Bradway, Brincliffe, Crystal Peaks, Darnall, Ecclesfield, Frecheville, High Green, Hillsborough, Killamarsh, Manor, Meadowhead, Meersbrook, Mosborough, Richmond, Sharrow, Shiregreen, Stocksbridge, Woodhouse and Woodseats.

ContactName.entry: John Steele, Regional Manager & Senior Instructor

category.entry: MARTIAL ARTS - KARATE, TAEKWONDO AND TANG SOO DO
